gen:link.msg:message: `AssetsOther` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_AssetsOther')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_AssetsOther return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsOtherDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsOtherDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsOtherCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfAssetsOtherCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`CashAndCashEquivalents` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashAndCashEquivalents')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_CashAndCashEquivalents return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedAssetsOtherBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
